description:
1. Reach to 2147483647 before the opponent
2. Click to blue button to build a unit (At the first select worker allways)
3. You can send soldier to kill an enemy unit (10 or higher leveled soldier can be sent)
3 Also you can send worker to enemy's empty slot
4. Every 60 step, workers and soldiers will gain level. Income(worker) or expense(Soldier)
will increase exponentially

Musics :

"Enter the Maze" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Dark Dance" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
